leve.name: Road to Recovery
leve.description: A certain someone came into contact with some rather poisonous substances during their experiments, and has been sent to Spagyrics for treatment. We never should have consented to their request, but here we are. The ward has asked us to supply them with stones needed to make a purifying agent. Considering the hand we had to play in this, I think it goes without saying we're obliged to help.
leve.client: Facet of Gathering Deputy Chief, Tatcha
